comments: This guy is a complete G. He explains what needs to be explained and if you need help then he\'ll help you. Besides those two things this guy actually seems to have personality besides just being a professor. He\'s cool and funny and that makes chem a lot more fun to learn.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Tough Grader (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  AMAZING LECTURES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Really tough content, really good professor! His powerpoints were organized with a lot of examples. He lists more textbook examples, but the book is not necessary. You do need a clicker to answer questions in class. Not a lot of opportunities for points besides exams, so take advantage of every point offered! Definitely recommend!

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Tough Grader (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  CARING
comments: Dr. Bennett is very understanding if you\'re willing to put in the time by going to his office hours and asking questions. He gives review packets out before each exam that resemble exam questions. If you\'re close on a grade, he will bump you. I went in not knowing much chemistry other than 110 and left knowing a lot more. He\'s a great guy.
